website_summaries.verdict: The VANMASS is tiny, affordable, light, blazingly fast, and above all else, easily handles up to 4 of your USB devices at once.
pros: Built to withstand high temperatures and shocks
Mac, Windows, Chrome, and Linux compatible
cons: This USB hub’s ports were designed to snuggly fit all devices, so it may take a little extra force to remove them from these tight ports

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: This VANMASS USB arrived on time and was as described. This USB hub works very well. I use it with my MacBook Pro. It really helps to have one of these because the USB ports are kind of close. This way, I can run an external drive and connect a thumb drive to transfer files and still have a couple of ports left over. For the price, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dean R.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Just received it and use it on my car's usb ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and use it on my car's usb charger. Many works, i can charge many equipments at the same time while i am driving. This product really helps me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this little usb hub with my Surface Pro 6 (which has only ONE usb connection??!!) for several months—and, so far, it does its job extremely well. At times, I’ve had all four slots filled up with everything from my mouse, flash drive, numeric keypad, blu-ray/dvd drive—sometimes all at once—and amazingly it somehow deliveres plenty of power and performance to whatever I plug into it. It’s rather impressive. It seems well made, durable, each slot usb 3, and a slim flat profile makes it easily portible. It does the job. So far, I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: MoonjumperTop Contributor: Star Trek

customer_reviews.title: It's cool for low power (input) devices and small thumb drives
customer_reviews.text: But that's it. If you hook up large thumb drives the throughout is limited. I have (2) 256gb flash drives, and an external 1tb ssd hooked up and one of my 256gb drives keep going in and out. I've tested and swapped the drives over all 4 ports, the issue continues to happen between the two 256gb drives. I removed the external 1tb ssd and it's working normally with both 256gb drives. Just be aware of the limitation. Also, it tends to run hot. That's just with it hooked up/nothing in it. Not horribly but noticable. Overall it's cool because it "works" so I'm not upset at all.
customer_reviews.author: VINTAGE

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work very well! I'm using it on a sailboat to split up a GPS, miniature AIS receiver, and my phone's data tethering. It handles all three well with solid data speeds and power. I've only been using it for a week or so, and will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: PuhCHOW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The product is as advertised. I received it in great condition very lightweight and works well with my MacBook. I def needed this hub as I’ve built a home recording studio and have several devices needing connection. The Vanmass USB Hub came extremely in handy and does very well for the price. As of now I’m completely satisfied with my purchase. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: PhillyTF

customer_reviews.title: Light, modest, easy on the eyes, works great.
customer_reviews.text: I like this slick and modest hub. It's small and light enough to unnoticeably carry it around with you anywhere, and it gets the job done as expected. I would certainly get more of these if I needed the extra ports.
customer_reviews.author: Dan A.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, versatile and feels well-built. The cable isn't too long so that the hub looks messy when I take it out and use it in public, and the sleek encasing is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Océane

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought a brand new Dell all-in-one computer, and I was really disappointed that it only had one accessible USB port (the other two are hidden on the back of the stand, oddly). So this little gadget came to the rescue. It works fine, and I've used it daily for several months. As someone else said, it is a tight fit when you plug something in. But I mostly keep my stuff plugged in, so that hasn't bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a USB Hub that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a USB Hub that actually works! After trying two other brands that kept crashing or slowing my peripherals, this one works flawlessly. My only nit pick is that the USB plug and the sockets are a bit tighter than I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: DWM

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It works beautifully. The ports feel very secure. I have a lot of accessories to plug in for my set up and one of my ports on my computer is kind of wiggly and at times my controller will disconnect in the middle of a game, this totally solved that issue. The ports are secure and I’m able to plug in my keyboard, mouse, Controller, and headset with just one port on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: It works; for laptops with only one or two USB ports it works great.
customer_reviews.text: While I like that it is light weight and not bulky, I worry how it will hold up in a 'road warrior's' bag. Right now I am stuck at home like everyone else, trying to work remotely and this gives me the ports I need. Keyboard, mouse, headset, and a port for a memory stick.
customer_reviews.author: L. Segal

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple USB connections. SSD, HDD, Wireless mouse and editing tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this product. I was able to connect my editing tablet, wireless mouse and both of my hard drives. It work flawlessly. Recommended 100%
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: GEAT UNIT
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this unit I can run my Ham equipment, plus plug accessories that I need to use both for 2.0 and 3.0 USB and each plug in finds its own comm port. I would recommend this unit for anyone who needs multiple access.
customer_reviews.author: Finn

customer_reviews.title: It's good that I can have my phone
customer_reviews.text: I only had two USB ports for my laptop, so I bought this as an extension for the USB. It's good that I can have my phone, iPad, and other devices to be connected to the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Su Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive USB hub
customer_reviews.text: I recently acquired a new laptop with 3.0 usb capability and needed a hub to handle all my peripherals like external backup drive, DVD drive, external mouse and keyboard. The Vanmass hub has performed well. I would definitely recommend this hub.
customer_reviews.author: Penbaron

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted. My laptop had only two ports for USB drives. This adapter was shipped as scheduled and works perfectly. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ehsan U Rehman

customer_reviews.title: Not a good neighbor on my Mac Mini
customer_reviews.text: My printers are angry and won't respond. Internet access goes haywire. Not a good neighbor on my Mac Mini. LATER: 3/25/19 emails from Vanmass customer service; a new hub adapter or refund? I asked for a nw Hub which has arrived. I'm trying it out. Will let you know. Good words for their customer service department who found this complaint, me and reached out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste $16 on it
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all. Plugged it in and nothing charges. Don't waste $16 on it.
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this for the Raspberry Pi
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten this for a Raspberry Pi 3+ that I wanted to switch over to USB booting. It worked fine for the first day, but then it would not boot afterwards. I unplugged the USB hub and it started working again. It worked fine with a regular PC, so there must be something in this that doesn't play nice with the Pi's hardware. If you're not going to use this for a Raspberry Pi, then it's not bad. Just know what you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: Arron S.

customer_reviews.title: Compact Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful--handles any device. Very lightweight and takes up very little travel space. Very convenient for desktop use also---do not require adapters that need power.
customer_reviews.author: Rudin

customer_reviews.title: Works, but has design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Reads drives, but its impossible to pull the flash drive out with out a good amount of force. Design flaw maybe? I returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: aznboida59

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Have a laptop with too few USB ports. Occasionally had to unplug something to connect something else. Connected my wireless mouse and my printer to the Adapter. Now have three available USB ports (two on the adapter and one on the laptop) available for occasional other devices. The cable out of the adapter (10.5 in.) could have been a few inches longer but not really a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: This was a nice cheap solution that worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Worked as required after reboot. I used this on an old laptop running windows 7. I needed additional ports for software dongles, and they both worked with this device and the machine and laser I used for engraving. This was a nice cheap solution that worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Small but very useful
customer_reviews.text: Love the streamlined case; it fits in a small space but I can plug in my portable scanner, label printer, etc. Small package with big potential.
customer_reviews.author: MarMar

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I already have three things plugged into it and haven’t had any problems. It’s small and doesn’t take up space on my desk
customer_reviews.author: David MacDougall

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Attachment to my Imac
customer_reviews.text: This has allowed me to connect multiple external HD to my iMac for additional file storage. Well made and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Perlin

customer_reviews.title: USB four port hub.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, small four port USB hub. Sturdy construction. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: TB in Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Works
customer_reviews.text: Computer recognizes only USB's and any size USB will work and you can charge something while your viewing what's on a USB. I really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: GMD

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: My laptop only has 3 USB ports, and sits on a small table. This hub provides me with the extras, and does not take up much room. The slots are a little tight, but that's OK. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Witherow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect expansion
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for. Put in my vehicle for support for phone chargers 4 Uber/Lyft driving.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe8887

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Made my life so much easier as all my USB ports on my all in one pc were in the back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works with the Switch.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a way to add players to my Nintendo Switch console. It worked right out of the box. I have used it for hours on end without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works great to add extra USB ports to my Surface which one has one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: I just received it for a few days, It works well so far, and looks pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding ports !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for adding pots to laptop. Works thru Dell docking station. Clean, sleak design!
customer_reviews.author: LeVann

customer_reviews.title: Simply PLUG & PLAY!
customer_reviews.text: Plug & Play. Works exactly as advertised and good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Handy dandy
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a new computer and it did not have enough USB ports for my other equipment this came in very handy for that purpose. It is a quality product and the overall experience in purchasing was great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Baumgardner

customer_reviews.title: Need an extra port this works great!
customer_reviews.text: I only had 2 ports on my computer and adding this I'm able to plug in extra devices to my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: KSLVOORHEES

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My old USB hubs needed to be replaced. This was an inexpensive solution - great value.
customer_reviews.author: jchick

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made and works. Happy buyer here. And they kept reaching out to confirm my satisfaction with the product. 😎👍✔️
customer_reviews.author: MARK T

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. You plug things in and they work. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Chehalin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Been using it a while and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: JoeDingles

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have a laptop that only has 2 USB ports. I need at least 4 to do my job when I work at home. This is exactly what I needed. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Moran

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t charge two phones
customer_reviews.text: Got it to charge two phones in the car. Plugged them both in and it would only charge one. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized.
customer_reviews.text: It serves y purpose of having extra USB's of my Macbook. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: p2S

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Many hubs are pretty pricey and this one does what I need it to do, and for a very good price. On the downside, inserting and removing the memory drives is a bit of a struggle -- tight fit!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Garza

customer_reviews.title: Slim and fast
customer_reviews.text: Very good and slim,the speed for file transfer is very high. It is worth the money. Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Xue Liu

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and effective
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with build quality. Your USB cable plugs in firmly and the detents hold tight. The material has a nice finish and it looks great. I like how sleek it is for a dirt cheap solution.
customer_reviews.author: 1NMOT1ON

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, well worth it and it works perfectly with all my devices: ps3, mc and windows
customer_reviews.author: Yeap

customer_reviews.title: Made with heavy duty materials. Very solid and each port has full power.
customer_reviews.text: Solid and does exactly what it says. Very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Seller is great to work with
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cut down on charging blocks. It will not charge my iPhone X. Seller was great to work with me & even refunded my purchase amount. I'll definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gilleran

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: The simplicity and great function of this is what gets me. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mason Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Solid, holds connection.
customer_reviews.text: sturdy build, sits in the middle of my living room floor and nothing plugged into it loses connection.
customer_reviews.author: Theron Tracanna

customer_reviews.title: Oculus compatible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my oculus rift because my pc only has 3 3.0 outlets now I have 4 sensors and I'm having a blast.
customer_reviews.author: God speaker zaoses

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks very nice. Very slim and take up no room like another one I have.
customer_reviews.author: allen skogman

customer_reviews.title: warranty
customer_reviews.text: i buy a product that have a problem, the Customer Service took care of it in a remarkable way, until I was satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I was able to connect multiple items under one hub..Works great!

customer_reviews.title: Additionally added usb ports
customer_reviews.text: Compact and durable. Just the right size in length and width. So far working good.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says it will do!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says it will do! What more can you ask of a product?
customer_reviews.author: Louis Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight with the USB plugs but that's fine. Speed seems to be up to the billing, too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very slim and doe snot take space. Perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product extended my limited USB ports thereby permitting me to utilize my wireless mouse, keyboard and Zip drives. It worked great!

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing product. I use it for my laptop and it works fine

customer_reviews.title: Is as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it for very long, but seems to do what it was advertised to do.
customer_reviews.author: Green Chef

customer_reviews.title: The hub is great and working exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: The hub is great and working exactly as described. We got this one to use in the car to allow multiple charge points, but I’ll probably pick one up for my laptop as well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gritzmaker

customer_reviews.title: helpful product
customer_reviews.text: I needed more USB ports and this did the job
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Scott Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've had many hubs and this one is slim, sleek, and stylish. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: The quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Yassss love this item it's perfect for what I need.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: I have used it less than 10 times and it has the connection issue

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says and it doesn't occupy too much space.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for my surface pro tablet. It works great.

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: It does what I needed it to do. Works good.

customer_reviews.title: That it is possible to add more USB ports to my laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Love that I now have additional ports to use as I wish.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Small, sleek, helps keep the clutter asay from my laptop

customer_reviews.text: Works great. Exactly what I needed to add a peripheral to my Mac.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hub is small, clean looking and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Candace B.

customer_reviews.title: & It works fine. My only reservation is that the sockets are ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it so I would have room to use multiple flash drives, & It works fine. My only reservation is that the sockets are very tight, so it's a struggle to remove my flash drives.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: it gets the job done and it's light weight
customer_reviews.text: The USB ports kind of clips my usb plugs a bit too hard but I'm guessing that's for a guaranteed connection. The build quality of the outer casing is pretty cheap quality but it works both ways by being light. It works as it should so that's it. It's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Villafane

customer_reviews.title: Like it !
customer_reviews.text: This is a not only cheap but also high quality product

customer_reviews.title: Pretty average usb hub.
customer_reviews.text: You basically get what you pay for, the hubs light weight and great for traveling easy to stick in a laptop bag. Great for charging multiple items at once.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: VANMASS USB Hub Adapter, 4-in-1 USB Splitter with 4 USB 3.0 Ports, High-Speed Data Transfer and Quadruple Protection, USB Dongle Compatible with MacBook, Mac, iMac, Surface, XPS, and Other Laptops
feature_bullets: 🌻 4 USB 3.0 PORTS : 4 USB 3.0 ports support the connection of 4 USB devices simultaneously, such as external hard drives, USB flash drives, mouse, keyboard, memory cards and so on.
🌻 SUPER-SPEED TRANSMISSION : Uploading or downloading 1G HD movies or files in just seconds with a speed up to 5Gbps.
🌻 MULTIPLE PROTECTION : Being made of advanced quality chips and endurable material, it provides devices with over-current, over-voltage, short-circuit and over-temperature protection.
🌻 WIDE COMPATIBILITY : Compatible with Windows, Mac OS, Android, Linux and Chrome System. It also supports USB 2.0. Note: No drives or power adapters required. Just plug in and play!
🌻 DELICATE CRAFT : The sandblasted surface makes the touch feeling better. Meanwhile, it is so lightweight and portable with a weight 1.13 ounces that you can take it to anywhere.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars228 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
